titleStmt.title: Malice detected, in printing certain informations and examinations concerning Lieut. Col. John Lilburn, the morning of his tryal; and which were not at all brought into his indictment.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Severall informations and examinations taken concerning Lieutenant Colonell John Lilburn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
